title.rendered: TS ECET 2025 [Lateral Entry; Diploma into B.Tech; CBT Exam]: Apply by April 19

content.rendered:
Applications are invited to Diploma holder or a B.Sc (Mathematics) graduate looking to enter the 2nd year of B.Tech/B.Pharmacy. TS ECET 2025 deadline is fast approaching.

About TS ECET 2025

Osmania University has released the details on TS ECET 2025 registrations. on, March 2025. TS ECET, also known as Telangana State Engineering Common Entrance Test is a common entrance test conducted by the Osmania University on behalf of the Telangana State Council of Higher Education for Diploma Holders and for BSc (Mathematics) degree holders. Apply before April 19, 2025. TS ECET 2025 application process comprises registration, form filling, and payment of fees. The registered candidates will be issued TS ECET hall tickets online.

    Key Details

    • Exam Date: May 12, 2025
    • Conducting Authority: Osmania University, on behalf of TSCHE

    Important Dates

    • Notification Release: February 25, 2025
    • Online Application Start: March 3, 2025
    • Last Date for Submission: April 19, 2025
    • Admit Card Release: First week of May 2025
    • Result Declaration: June 2025 (Tentative)

    Who Can Apply?

    • Diploma Holders in Engineering/Pharmacy from Telangana or Andhra Pradesh
    • B.Sc (Mathematics) graduates
    • General Category: Minimum 45% in qualifying exam
    • SC/ST Candidates: Minimum 40%

    Application Fee

    • General/OBC: ₹900/-
    • SC/ST: ₹500/-

    How to Apply?

    • Register on the TS ECET 2025 official website
    • Pay the application fee via online mode
    • Fill out the form with personal & academic details
    • Upload required documents in the prescribed format
    • Submit & print the application for future reference

    TS ECET 2025 Exam Pattern

    • Mode: Computer-Based Test (CBT)
    • Duration: 3 Hours
    • Total Questions: 200 (MCQs)
    • Subjects:
    • Engineering Stream: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry & Core Engineering
    • Pharmacy Stream: Pharmaceutics, Pharmacognosy, Pharmaceutical Chemistry & Pharmacology
    • B.Sc (Mathematics): Mathematics, Analytical Ability & Communicative English
    • Marking Scheme: 1 mark per correct answer, No Negative Marking!

    Why TS ECET 2025?

    • Direct admission to 2nd year of Engineering & Pharmacy
    • Top colleges across Telangana accept TS ECET scores
    • No negative marking – Maximize your score!

    Click here to view the official notification for TS ECET 2025 :Lateral Entry; Diploma into B.Tech; CBT Exam
